title: Vittoria Releases Super Limited Gold Sidewall Corsa Pros to Celebrate Year of Big Wins
content:
Only 2,023 gold pairs have been made to commemorate it winning Milan-San Remo, Paris-Roubaix, all three grand tours and road worlds.

Read the full article at Vittoria Releases Super Limited Gold Sidewall Corsa Pros to Celebrate Year of Big Wins on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
